Sentencas: Gadolinium doped cerium oxide (GDC) thin films are intensively investigated for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) application as a solid electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films

Sentencas: Classical methods that are used for synthesis of doped oxide materials are based on high temperature diffusion and solid state reactions of powder-form oxide mixtures.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films

Sentencas: It is usually difficult to fabricate a thin GDC electrolyte film with a dense structure by a classical sintering technique, therefore this work was dedicated to a novel synthesis technique based on the sintering of Gd2O3/CeO2 multilayers deposited by reactive DC magnetron sputtering.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films

Sentencas: The main purpose of the present investigation is to receive more information about the possibility to mix thin films of Gd2O3/CeO2 at intermediate temperatures (500-800 degrees C) in a relatively short period of time (1 h).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films

Sentencas: Cross-section morphology of the samples was investigated by Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films

Sentencas: Crystal structure and oxide stoichiometry was examined by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films

Sentencas: The results revealed that crystallite size growth and layer mixing depends not only on sintering temperature, but also on bilayer period.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of GDC solid electrolytes obtained by solid state sintering of multilayer thin films
